name: Midesk: Competitive Intelligence News Helper
description: The Midesk Helper allows you to swiftly save news to your Midesk workspace and speed up your daily news workflows.
author: hello@midesk.co

content_security_policy.sandbox: sandbox allow-scripts allow-forms allow-popups allow-modals; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval'; child-src 'self';
